alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 12:46AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern West Feliciana, West Baton Rouge, southeastern Pointe Coupee, northwestern Livingston, southwestern East Feliciana, northern Iberville and East Baton Rouge Parishes through 130 AM CDT... At 1246 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Port Allen, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Denham Springs, Plaquemine, Port Allen, New Roads, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Walker, Addis, Brusly, Livonia, Maringouin, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Westminster, Erwinville, Watson and Ramah. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 128 and 167. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana
